definition: to right a wrong/to redress an injustice
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
surname Xue
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: After the game we (reporter) learnt that the action he made was actually proposing to Xue Shen.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛之后，记者们了解到他其实是要向申雪求婚。

sentences.english: Shen and Zhao, though, did not have the same difficulty finding each other.
sentences.chinese: 而申雪和赵宏博，在跳接时却没有遇上同样的困难。

sentences.english: A: Then you must know Shen Xue and Zhao Hongbo.
sentences.chinese: 那你一定知道申雪和赵宏博了。

sentences.english: The first throw quad salchow Shen Xue and Zhao Hongbo attempted was flawless.
sentences.chinese: 申雪和越宏博试作的和一个四周抛跳完美无瑕。
